entry.def: If you say that someone is self-indulgent, you mean that they allow themselves to have or do the things that they enjoy very much.

example.ex: Why give publicity to this self-indulgent, adolescent oaf?...
example.tran: 为什么要宣传报道这个行为任性、青春期未满的白痴呢？

example.ex: To buy flowers for myself seems wildly self-indulgent.
example.tran: 为自己买花似乎太放纵自己了。

means.word_mean: 1. indulgent of your own appetites and desires;

sentences.sentence: "a self-indulgent...way of looking at life"- Havelock Ellis
